content: Ist there any standard "admin" account for Dataverse in the latest gdcc/dataverse:alpha image? Just asking because in older images there was a super user (admin) user and that one does not work anymore. I assume it's related to the raised security measures, which is good but wondering if there is a way to create one without using the Payara admin interface?
It has always been dataverseAdmin:admin1 when you are using the dev persona for bootstrapping.
The Payara Console will not help you with creating a user
As I mentioned in the other topic, you hardly ever touch the admin console

Ah perfect, thanks :wink: Yes, I am sometimes blindly forwarding the requests from the data managers (like the Payara access). I feel like I should spend much more time with dataverse, even though my task is to keep the service up and running :laughing: The login works, many thanks. I'll now continue to secure it.
Tamas Gal has marked this topic as resolved.
